mapper.select:
select id id, DATE_FORMAT(t.betendtime, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') betEndTime, t.turnnum turnNum, DATE_FORMAT(t.opentime, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') openTime, t.n1 n1, t.n2 n2, t.n3 n3, t.n4 n4, t.n5 n5, t.OPEN_NUM openNum from T_CAIPIAO_INFO t where t.id in
#{item}
select t.OPEN_NUM FROM T_CAIPIAO_INFO t where t.ID = #{id}
select min(t.ID) from ${tableName} t where t.ID > ${minId}
SELECT t.id FROM ${tableName} t WHERE t.ID BETWEEN ${minId} and ${m}
select ID from ${tableName} limit ${page},1000
select ID from ${tableName} T ORDER BY T.ID limit ${page},5001
select ID from ${tableName} T ORDER BY T.ID limit ${page},10001

select id id, DATE_FORMAT(t.betendtime, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') betEndTime, t.turnnum turnNum, DATE_FORMAT(t.opentime, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') openTime, t.n1 n1, t.n2 n2, t.n3 n3, t.n4 n4, t.n5 n5, t.OPEN_NUM openNum from T_CAIPIAO_INFO t where t.id in (select w.id - 1 from T_CAIPIAO_INFO w where w.open_num = #{openNum}) and t.open_num = #{preOpenNUm}

select w3.id id from (select w.id from T_CAIPIAO_INFO w where w.n1 = #{open1}) w3,
(select w.id from T_CAIPIAO_INFO w where w.n1 = #{open2}) w2,
(select w.id from T_CAIPIAO_INFO w where w.n1 =#{open3}) w1 where w1.id = w2.id - 1 and w2.id = w3.id - 1

select w3.id id from (select w.id from T_CAIPIAO_INFO w where w.n2 = #{open1}) w3,
(select w.id from T_CAIPIAO_INFO w where w.n2 = #{open2}) w2,
(select w.id from T_CAIPIAO_INFO w where w.n2 =#{open3}) w1 where w1.id = w2.id - 1 and w2.id = w3.id - 1

select w3.id id from (select w.id from T_CAIPIAO_INFO w where w.n3 = #{open1}) w3,
(select w.id from T_CAIPIAO_INFO w where w.n3 = #{open2}) w2,
(select w.id from T_CAIPIAO_INFO w where w.n3 =#{open3}) w1 where w1.id = w2.id - 1 and w2.id = w3.id - 1

select w3.id id from (select w.id from T_CAIPIAO_INFO w where w.n4 = #{open1}) w3,
(select w.id from T_CAIPIAO_INFO w where w.n4 = #{open2}) w2,
(select w.id from T_CAIPIAO_INFO w where w.n4 =#{open3}) w1 where w1.id = w2.id - 1 and w2.id = w3.id - 1

select w3.id id from (select w.id from T_CAIPIAO_INFO w where w.n5 = #{open1}) w3,
(select w.id from T_CAIPIAO_INFO w where w.n5 = #{open2}) w2,
(select w.id from T_CAIPIAO_INFO w where w.n5 =#{open3}) w1 where w1.id = w2.id - 1 and w2.id = w3.id - 1

select id id, DATE_FORMAT(t.betendtime, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') betEndTime, t.turnnum turnNum, DATE_FORMAT(t.opentime, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') openTime, t.n1 n1, t.n2 n2, t.n3 n3, t.OPEN_NUM openNum from T_CANLADA_INFO t where t.id in
#{item}
select t1.id from T_CANLADA_INFO t1 where t1.ID in ( select t.ID - 1 from T_CANLADA_INFO t where CONCAT(t.N1, t.n2, t.N3) = #{openNum}) and CONCAT(t1.N1, t1.n2, t1.N3) = #{preOpenNum}
SELECT t1.ID from T_CANLADA_INFO t1 where t1.ID in (select t.ID -1 from T_CANLADA_INFO t where t.OPEN_NUM = #{openNum}) and t1.OPEN_NUM = #{preOpenNum}

select id id, DATE_FORMAT(t.betendtime, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') betEndTime, t.turnnum turnNum, DATE_FORMAT(t.opentime, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') openTime, t.n1 n1, t.n2 n2, t.n3 n3, t.n4 n4, t.n5 n5, t.OPEN_NUM openNum FROM T_CAIPIAO_INFO t where t.ID BETWEEN #{firstId} and #{endId};
SELECT t1.id FROM T_CAIPIAO_INFO t1 WHERE t1.remake LIKE #{openNumNew} AND t1.ID IN ( ( SELECT t.ID - 1 FROM T_CAIPIAO_INFO t WHERE remake LIKE #{openNumNew}) )

SELECT t2.id FROM T_CAIPIAO_INFO t2 WHERE t2.remake LIKE #{openNumNew} and t2.ID IN ( SELECT t1.ID - 1 FROM T_CAIPIAO_INFO t1 WHERE t1.remake LIKE #{openNumNew} AND t1.ID IN ( ( SELECT t.ID - 1 FROM T_CAIPIAO_INFO t WHERE remake LIKE #{openNumNew} )) )

SELECT t3.id FROM T_CAIPIAO_INFO t3 WHERE t3.remake LIKE #{openNumNew} AND t3.ID IN ( SELECT t2.id - 1 FROM T_CAIPIAO_INFO t2 WHERE t2.remake LIKE #{openNumNew} AND t2.ID IN ( SELECT t1.ID - 1 FROM T_CAIPIAO_INFO t1 WHERE t1.remake LIKE #{openNumNew} AND t1.ID IN ( ( SELECT t.ID - 1 FROM T_CAIPIAO_INFO t WHERE remake LIKE #{openNumNew} ) ) ) )

select t10.ID from T_CAIPIAO_INFO t10 where t10.ID in( select t9.ID - 1 from T_CAIPIAO_INFO t9 where t9.ID in( select t8.ID - 1 from T_CAIPIAO_INFO t8 where t8.ID in ( select t7.ID - 1 from T_CAIPIAO_INFO t7 where t7.ID in( select t6.ID - 1 from T_CAIPIAO_INFO t6 where t6.ID in ( select t5.ID - 1 from T_CAIPIAO_INFO t5 where t5.ID in ( select t4.ID - 1 FROM T_CAIPIAO_INFO t4 WHERE t4.ID in ( select t3.ID - 1 FROM T_CAIPIAO_INFO t3 where t3.ID in ( select t2.ID - 1 from T_CAIPIAO_INFO t2 where t2.ID in ( select t1.ID - 1 from T_CAIPIAO_INFO t1 where 1 = 1
and t1.REMARK < 23
and t1.REMARK >= 23 )
and t2.REMARK < 23
and t2.REMARK >= 23 )
and t3.REMARK < 23
and t3.REMARK >= 23 )
and t4.REMARK < 23
and t4.REMARK >= 23 )
and t5.REMARK < 23
and t5.REMARK >= 23 )
and t6.REMARK < 23
and t6.REMARK >= 23 )
and t7.REMARK < 23
and t7.REMARK >= 23 )
and t8.REMARK < 23
and t8.REMARK >= 23 )
and t9.REMARK < 23
and t9.REMARK >= 23 )
and t10.REMARK < 23
and t10.REMARK >= 23

select REMARK + 0 from T_CAIPIAO_INFO t where t.ID in
#{item}
